formattedAddress: 144 E 44th St, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text:
THEY MUST BE FIRED!!!
Gate:D 70, Time: 6:00PM.
From New York JFK to Vienna Austrian Airlines and then connecting fly to Tbilisi.
I have a Travel Document with Green Card. They asked a visa! Before my flight of course, I confirmed with Washington and New York Embassy that NO VISA NEEDED! These two people canceled my flight and didn’t call the supervisor. Even the first picture person told me that it’s his first time doing this! They didn’t want to help me at all (which is they don’t know their job!) and didn’t call the supervisor.
I also asked the Austrian Airlines Vienna and they also confirmed with Georgian Airways that NO VISA NEEDED. Yes, I’m screaming: “NO VISA NEEDED!”
These two UNEDUCATED, UNPROFESSIONAL, DISRESPECTFUL, DON’T KNOW THEIR JOB DESCRIPTION AND RESPONSIBILITY people needs to be EDUCATED and be PROFESSIONAL!They HARASSED, DISCRIMINATED ME!
THEY MUST BE FIRED!!!
How were they even hired?!
This is UNBELIEVABLE!
This is RIDICULOUS!
I’ve talked to my Lawyer and will take the further steps by LAW!!!
GEORGIAN AIRWAYS RESPONSIBLE PERSON MUST ANSWER FOR THIS MESS!!!

originalText.text: I had a very positive experience (I needed to renew my Georgian passport). It started in a strange way - the building doorman kept saying that nobody is there yet, even though it was my appointment time, and he wouldn't let me inside. Once this problem was fixed, I was greeted by a beautiful Georgian lady named Eteri; she accepted my application documents, guided me through the necessary steps, and completed the process in no time (and answered all my questions in a kind and professional manner). Thank you very much, kalbatono Eteri! It was a pleasure working with you!

originalText.text: Amazingly friendly and professional stuff! Special thanks to Ms.Diana Zhgenti and Eka for their heartfelt approach to our family emergency! Your support and desire to help was unparalleled. Keep up the good work!

originalText.text: Fantastic staff very happy for so  many years already nothing changed they are very knowledgeable helpful and ready to give you the best service

originalText.text: Where do I begin? This place is a HOT MESS. Staff there is rude and unprofessional. Lady at the front desk (I believe her name is EKA) has no clue what she's talking about and has an attitude. It is very sad that this place represents our country in NY. Staff there used to be a lot more professional and knowledgeable few years ago. Someone needs to look into this.
